column1: 4.2.4.1.4	 Electromagnetic stimulation  Electromagnetic stimulation (EMS) has been evaluated for its role in SUI therapy. In a double-blind RCT of EMS   including 70 women with SUI, no effect of EMS over sham in any outcome was recorded [335].
Vaginal oestrogen therapy improves SUI for postmenopausal women in the short term.
Neoadjuvant or adjuvant use of local oestrogens is ineffective as an adjunct to surgery for SUI.
Systemic HRT using conjugated equine oestrogens does not improve SUI and may worsen    pre-existing UI.
